cards.title: Glare
cards.desc: It seems looks really can kill.

cards.title: Final Presentation
cards.desc: It's like that dream, where you're standing in your underwear.

cards.title: Black Cat
cards.desc: Some think black cats are unlucky, this one isn't.

cards.title: Vlad
cards.desc: He vants to suck your blood.

cards.title: Lucky Goldfish
cards.desc: Heart of gold, this fish is worth its weight in gold.

cards.title: Green Thumb
cards.desc: They said she could grow anything, so she grows vines that choke the life out of her enemy.

cards.title: Luna Sol
cards.desc: Sunrise, sunset, you don't want to get this celestial being upset.

cards.title: Beyonce
cards.desc: She doesn't really need a description.

cards.title: Water Bender
cards.desc: Can heal you with the power of water.
